channel.title: Player standing in black void
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape Forums, The character is standing in the middle of a black void. how do I fix this?
Server run without client:
Starting Recreation F2P ClipMap.bin not Found java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\Data\doors.txt (The system cannot find the pat specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at com.rs2.world.Doors.processLineByLine(Doors.java:220) at com.rs2.world.Doors.load(Doors.java:211) at com.rs2.Server.main(Server.java:72) Loaded 0 doors in 16ms. java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\Data\doubledoors.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at com.rs2.world.DoubleDoors.processLineByLine(DoubleDoors.java:362) at com.rs2.world.DoubleDoors.load(DoubleDoors.java:353) at com.rs2.Server.main(Server.java:73) Loaded 0 Double doors in 0ms. [CRITICAL] Can't load ./data/requirements.txt npc.cfg: file not found. npcdrops.cfg: file not found. autospawn.cfg: file not found. item.cfg: file not found. shops.cfg: file not found. Recreation F2P has succesfully started. Players: 0, Average cycle time: 0ms Engine load: 0.0%, Slow cycles: 0
When Client is run with server:
Error while loading player data! bannedips:127.0.0.1 java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\bannedips.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at com.rs2.Server.checkLog(Server.java:131) at com.rs2.Server.checkHost(Server.java:123) at com.rs2.Server.run(Server.java:193) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Incoming connection from: 127.0.0.1:50077 Critical Error while checking data! tempbans:Player java.io.FileNotFoundException: PlayerData\tempbans.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at com.rs2.util.LogHandler.checkLog(LogHandler.java:36) at com.rs2.util.LoginProtocol.loginProtocol(LoginProtocol.java:144) at com.rs2.model.players.Client.run(Client.java:424) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical Error while checking data! bans:Player java.io.FileNotFoundException: PlayerData\bans.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at com.rs2.util.LogHandler.checkLog(LogHandler.java:36) at com.rs2.util.LoginProtocol.loginProtocol(LoginProtocol.java:152) at com.rs2.model.players.Client.run(Client.java:424) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Player: character file not found. Critical Error while checking data! mutes:Player java.io.FileNotFoundException: PlayerData\mutes.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at com.rs2.util.LogHandler.checkLog(LogHandler.java:36) at com.rs2.net.LoginPlayer.login(LoginPlayer.java:156) at com.rs2.model.players.Client.initialize(Client.java:213) at com.rs2.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:194) at com.rs2.Process.run(Process.java:12) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical Error while checking data! mutes2:127.0.0.1 java.io.FileNotFoundException: PlayerData\mutes2.txt (The system cannot find the path specified)
and it keeps going....

item.title: Player standing in black void
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

Well, if you read what prints out you could easily point out what is wrong. All of the errors are because the files are not found (FileNotFound).

So either you need to place the files in the correct path, or if you don’t have the files, make them or just comment them out.

For example, .\Data\doors.txt . That file is either in the wrong path or is missing. That is all you have to know in order to fix these errors.

Read full topic
